ISSUE.TITLE: Set Watchtower to selectively watch shadowbox
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'll admit I should have read the install script a little more carefully, but while running the install, watchtower tried updating all my other containers, which ended up breaking my wordpress container :( I would like to suggest only setting watchtower to selectively watch shadowbox. Reading the watchtower documentation, this can be done by passing in `--label-enable` as a param on watchtower and adding `--label=com.centurylinklabs.watchtower.enable=true` on shadowbox. More information can be found on the [watchtower repo](https://github.com/v2tec/watchtower#selectively-watching-containers)
